content: Hey! Turns out the tutorials went missing on the Isabelle website (https://isabelle.in.tum.de/documentation.html). Each of the links return a 404.
When in doubt: https://downforeveryoneorjustme.com/isabelle.in.tum.de?proto=https :smile:

I checked the Internet Archive and it also has captured the 404s (https://web.archive.org/web/20221104011023/https://isabelle.in.tum.de/dist/Isabelle2021-1/doc/sledgehammer.pdf). Looks like someone has updated it already or some cache issue on my end. :thumbs_up:
